title: Change Editor/View/Perspective F1 Help Bug
description: When using the change editor, view, or perspective, the F1 help feature is not working correctly.
OB: When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 displays some help. However, the help window closes immediately, preventing the user from reading its contents.
EB: When the user presses F1 while in the change editor menu, the help window should stay open, allowing the user to read the provided help information.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the change editor menu.
2. Press the F1 key.
